txt.en: 'Stay safe on the road, my friend. We will see each other again.\n\n'Halbarad wanted to see you once you had made your farewells. He is somewhere within the camp, [placeholder]. You should return to him and prepare to depart.'

'I am not one for long farewells, my friend. Know that you are one of us, with ties not of blood but rather strengthened by blood: the blood of our foes. Our roads entwined this far, and may do so again, but for now it is the time of leave-taking.\n\n'[placeholder], it has been an honour to travel with you. The Grey Company owes you much and more.'
Calenglad nods at you, but there is nothing left to say and he keeps his peace.
Corunir nods at you, but there is nothing left to be said and he keeps his peace.
The time has come for your path to diverge from that of the Grey Company, and you should bid your farewells to the Rangers.
Golodir nods at you, but there is nothing left to be said and he keeps his peace.
'Halbarad is in the camp over there. He wanted you to return to him once you had made your farewells.'
Radanir nods at you, but there is nothing left to say and he keeps his peace.
Talk to Halbarad in the camp in the Gravenwood
Halbarad is in the camp in the Gravenwood.\n\nYou have made your farewells and should return now to Halbarad.
